casebody.data:
TOWNSHIP OF WILLIAMSTOWN, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
SANDALWOOD RANCH, LLC, Alec Kolenda, and Sarah Kolenda, Defendants-Appellants,
and
Love Advertising, Inc., Defendant. SC: 158171
COA: 337469 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motions of defendants-appellants to extend the time for filing their reply and to exceed the page limitation are GRANTED.

The reply submitted on September 18, 2018, is accepted for filing.
